sen.e: Sanekage MUSHANOKOJI (December 22, 1661 - November 11, 1738) was a court noble and poet from the early to middle Edo period.

sen.j: 実父は正親町三条家庶流の院参の公家、西郊実信で、堂上の武者小路公種の養子となる。
sen.e: His biological father was Sanenobu SAIKO, who was a court noble from a branch line of the Ogimachisanjo family and served for a retired emperor, and he was adopted by Kintane MUSHANOKOJI from high court nobility.
